import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductSreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p)=>p._id===match.params.id) console.log(product) return ( <> {/* {product.name} */} Atras

{product.name}

 ) } export default ProductSreen
